column2: "Mpɛn ebiasa nye yi a mereba hom nkyɛn. Adasefo beenu anaa baasa anomu na asɛm biara begyina."

column3: na mereka no bio: mbrɛ mpɛn ebien a mowɔ hom nkyɛn mekae no
column4: dɛmara na sesei a minnyi hom nkyɛn yi meka kyerɛ hɔn a wɔyɛɛ bɔn nkan no
column5: nye hɔn a wɔaka no nyina dɛ

column2: "osiandɛ hom rohwehwɛ Kraest a ɔkasa mo mu no ho biribi ehu
column3: ɔno na ɔnnyɛ mberɛw wɔ hom afamu
column4: na mbom ɔyɛ tumfo wɔ hom mu:"

column2: "na ɔnam mberɛw mu na wɔbɔɔ no mbeamudua mu dze
column3: naaso ɔnam Nyankopɔn tum do tse ase. Na hɛn so yɛyɛ mberɛw wɔ no mu dze
column4: naaso ɔnam Nyankopɔn tum do yɛnye no bɛtsena ase wɔ hom ntsi."

column2: "Hom mpɛnsampɛnsa hom mu nhwɛ dɛ hom wɔ gyedzi no mu anaa; hom nsɔ homho nhwɛ. Anaa hom nnyim dɛ Jesus Kraest tse hom mu? Gyedɛ gyama hom mmfora."
"Na m'enyi da do dɛ hom bohu dɛ hɛn dze
"Na yɛbɔ mpaa kyerɛ Nyankopɔn dɛ mma hom nnyɛ bɔn bi: nnyɛ dɛ ama woeehu hɛn dɛ yɛfora
column3: na mbom ama hom aayɛ dza ɔyɛ fɛw
column5: yaayɛ dɛ hɔn a wɔfora mpo."

column2: "Na yenntum nnyɛ hwee nntsia nokwar no
column3: na mbom yɛyɛ ma nokwar no."

column2: "Na sɛ yɛyɛ mberɛw ma hom yɛ dzen a
column3: yedzi dɛw; iyiara so ntsi na yɛbɔ mpaa

column2: "Iyiara ntsi na minnyi hom nkyɛn yi mekyerɛw iyi mebrɛ hom
column5: dɛ mbrɛ tum a Ewuradze dze maa me wɔ ntowdo na nnyɛ ɔsɛɛ bi ntsi no tse."

column4: hom ndzi dɛw; hom ndzi mu; hom werɛ nkyekyer; hom nyɛ adwenkor; hom ntsena asomdwee mu; na ɔdɔ nye asomdwee Nyankopɔn nye hom bɛtsena."
nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn anyɛnkoyɛ nka hom nyina."
